attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
'Switch is basically a bunch of stuff on TV, Radio, online and your mobile. It's for people that like funny, random, cool shows and who want to get involved. ' (find out more here: http://www.bbc.co.uk/switch/ )
The BBC is planning to axe Switch... the section of the BBC that teens all over the country know and love. Please don't let them . Thanks.
You can also: http://www.petition.fm/petitions/saveswitch

rejection.details: The BBC is independent of government. This is a matter for direct communication with the BBC.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
